body.bibl: Camplani, Alberto. “Fourth-Century Synods in Latin and Syriac Canonical Collections and Their Preservation in the Antiochene Archives (Serdica 343 CE – Antioch 325 CE).” In Cultures in Contact: Transfer of Knowledge in the Mediterranean Context. Selected Papers, edited by Sofía Torallas Tovar and Juan Pedro Monferrer-Sala, 61–72. Series Syro-Arabica 1. Cordoba: Cordoba Near Eastern Research Unit / Beirut: Centre de Documentation et de Recherches Arabes Chrétiennes, 2013.
